name: CGColorRenderingIntent
desc: Handling options for colors that are not located within the destination color space of a graphics context.

items.name: case defaultIntent
items.desc: The default rendering intent for the graphics context.

items.name: case perceptual
items.desc: Preserve the visual relationship between colors by compressing the gamut of the graphics context to fit inside the gamut of the output device. Perceptual intent is good for photographs and other complex, detailed images.
